message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you and we're confident it will meet all your needs. I'm offering it to you today for $110, which is a great deal considering its value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to save $10!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider your offer. However, I need to maintain a certain margin for the product. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $107. This allows us to meet somewhere in the middle.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $102 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $104. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between our positions and maintains a healthy margin for me. I hope this meets your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand your situation, Bob. After evaluating our conversation, I am willing to sell the product to you for $102. This price reflects a fair compromise and maintains a reasonable margin for me. I hope this offer is acceptable.
